GSD.description:
xtensa: xtfpga: Fix refcount leak bug in setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.202 by commit a52972ee706b438302eb0350e61f378eb191e3d1. For more details please see the references link.
